attributes.action: Ban the group islam4uk from broadcasting their insulting and provocative ideas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Islam4uk is the worst kind of revolutionist group, their provocative behaviour and ideas could spark a lot more riots and stuff than it would than not letting them, i am very angry at the idea of them wanting to march through wooton bassett,the place were we remember OUR dead its is the most disgraceful thing i have ever heard and to be wuite honest i and quite a few other people feel that this group should be banned from broadcasting such ideas.!!!!!

rejection.details: Islam4uk was proscribed by the Home Secretary on Thursday 15 January.  Membership of this group is now a criminal offence.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
